article: Good Friend Clothes Store Hello, boys and girls! Welcome to Good Friend. You can buy your clothes at very good prices. We have red and white skirts for only $23. Do you like hats? Blue and black hats are only $15. How much are the jackets? The green jackets are $45 and the blue ones are $42. Do you need trousers? You can get them for only $40. Our T-shirts are on sale, too. You can buy them for $29. What color do you want? We have T-shirts in white, purple and green. How about these black and brown socks? Only $5 for two pairs. Come and see now!
questions: How much is a blue jacket?
